name: Call Desk
overview:
Call Desk Virtual Live Receptionist Our Live Virtual Receptionist service helps businesses stay connected with their customers via telephone, e-mail or chat. We help businesses enhance their customer service, increase productivity and save money in staffing costs.

At Call Desk Business Services, we help our clients with professional setup and management of pay-per-click (PPC) advertising on Google AdWords and Yahoo. We develop a customized solutions for our clients based on their individual business needs.

CallDesk is not an answering service. We are a Live Receptionist Service. We act as a virtual extension of your staff. Unlike large call centers and answering services, your calls will be answered by the same group of receptionists all the time. This allows the receptionists to develop a better working relationship with your clients. Your clients will also appreciate having a familiar voice each time they call.

The Call Desk live receptionists will enhance your businessâ€™s image, increase productivity and save you money in staffing costs. For a fraction of the cost of hiring a full-time receptionist, you will have a professional receptionist, who does not call in sick or ask for benefits. You will have a peace of mind, knowing that your valuable customers and prospects are taken care of.

Your CallDesk Receptionist will answer all your calls and seamlessly transfer them to you, as if she was sitting in your office. CallDesk Receptionists also take appointments, provide information about your company and take orders for you.

Whether you need a full time receptionist or help with overflow calls, we are here for you. We can answer your calls when your staff are on lunch, during emergencies or overflow calls.

CallDesk Receptionists will give you the freedom to travel, or have productive meetings with clients or employees, without phone interruptions.
